text: Anata wa, ka no anata ni kudasa reta mono, oyobi anata izen ni kudasa reta mono o shinjiru to, tada Ro hashitte iru-sha-tachi o minakatta no ka. Kare-ra wa jashin o kobamu yō, meiji rarete iru ni mo kakawarazu, sono (sōgi no) saitei no tame, tagaini jashin ni tayorou to nozonde iru. Mata akuma wa, kare-ra ga (seidō kara) tōku mayoi saru yō ni michibikou to nozonde iru
